meaningMnemonic: Using our <kanji>intuition</kanji> we will come up with a <kanji>plan</kanji>. We'll be <vocabulary>taking into consideration</vocabulary> the information we have along with our intuition, so don't worry.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
